import.name: Lucera
import.description:
A specialty piece signed under the trigger as created by ${"content":"Via","class":"rs-orange"}$ as her attempt to make peace with the creation of ${Harbinger,darkorange}$.

An extremely heavy crossbow that has a light glow around it. It can fire without any bolts but uses specialty bolts like the one's used by ${Harbinger,darkorange}$. And while Lucera can use Harbinger's bolts, Harbinger can not use a Luceran bolt.

Despite its weight, the crossbow does not hinder movement. Though it is almost impossible to hide, the glow of the crossbow does not seem to sway anyone in either direction.

Shots from this crossbow may deal additional damage depending on the bolt used.

Loading this crossbow takes ${"content":"All Turn Actions","class":"rs-orange"}$; All Actions and Bonus Actions (But Not Movement) are used to reload. Any abilities that grant additional Actions or Bonus Actions are negated.

The light enchantment on this bow protects the attuned from ${"content":"Harbinger's Curse","class":"rs-orange"}$ and grants ${2d12,darkorange}$ reduction against Necrotic damage.

import.name: Glasses of Night
Stone Talisman
import.description: A simple stone talisman

import.name: Poem: Fish Don't Kill My Vibe
Blessed Path
import.description:
A specialty bolt used by the crossbow Lucera.

If an enemy is struck by an attack with this bolt, all allies in a 10 stud radius of the creature are ${Blessed,darkorange}$ (1d4 bonus to saves and checks for 10 rounds).

import.name: Memory Stone
import.description:
A stone that helps hone one's thoughts to recall a distant memory as best they are able.

Can consume a charge to pull a memory from the past.

Even on a failed difficulty check, you will still gain some knowledge. On a success, you remember clearly.

import.name: Arcar's Crown
import.description: The wearer can exert control over small spiders within 50 studs.
import.note:
If the creature wearing it is not of evil alignment, the crown can not be unattuned.

If good alignment, deals 1d4 necrotic damage at the end of any round of combat in which an evil or neutral creature suffered harm from your actions.

import.name: Alchemy Ingredient Bundle
import.description:
Serves as general ingredients for creating potions with alchemy.

Some potions may require other special ingredients.
import.note: Used in brewing

import.name: Enchanting Herbs
import.description:
Serves as general ingredients for creating enchantments.

All enchantments require corresponding stones at the least.

import.name: Ornate Rug
import.description:
"A large colorful rug with a beautiful pattern on it.

Sell it?

Enchant it?"

import.name: Painting
import.description: A large but beautiful painting.

import.name: Simple Wood Block
import.description:
A simple unit of wood, used in construction and in some enchantments.

Indirectly useful in alchemy as well for crafting some components.

import.name: Corruption Stone
import.description:
Used in advanced enchanting recipes, the enchanter attuned to the stone and wears it on their person for 10 days to slowly learn of the inner workings of the arcane magic within, performing a DC${15,darkorange}$ Arcana check every morning.

After 10 days and 6 successful Arcana checks, the stone can be used in enchanting.

The danger of powerful enchanting stones however is that the user risks negative magical effects against themselves, and anyone can attune to and learn of the stone, not just an enchanter.

import.name: Witch's Broom
import.description:
Once attuned to the broom, a creature may concentrate on the broom and pass a DC${18-wis,darkorange}$ Arcana check to activate the broom for 1 hour, allowing the attuned creature to fly on the broom.

The broom has a hard weight limit of ${150,darkorange}$ blocks, after which it simply falls to the ground.

import.name: Witch's Broom
import.description:
Once attuned to the broom, a creature may concentrate on the broom and pass a DC${18-wis,darkorange}$ Arcana check to activate the broom for 1 hour, allowing the attuned creature to fly on the broom.

The broom has a hard weight limit of ${200,darkorange}$ blocks (Your Weight and Your Inventory), after which it simply falls to the ground.

Attacks from the broom start at a disadvantage and any spells cast from the broom that have somatic (hand gesture) components that also involve a save give any target creatures advantage on their saves against that spell.

It does seem to have room for 1 and a half... maybe 2...

import.name: Boomstick
import.description: A unique Runic Weapon. Allows charges from magical runes kept in the creature's pouch be consumed to empower spells cast through it when the target is within range of this item.

import.name: Witch's Hat
import.description:
While worn, your hair is cursed a bright orange.

Also improves the creature's knowledge of spells, allowing for another spell to be memorized but seems to have done so at the cost of the creature's strength and constitution.
import.note:
One of the negatives can be removed but not both.

Previous Action Map:
{
    "action": [],
    "bonusAction": [],
    "reaction": []
}

import.name: Rune: Flamestrike
import.description: A powerful rune enchanted to channel fire damage through a Runic Weapon. When casting a spell or attacking using the a Runic Weapon, you may consume one charge from this rune to add ${(int)d6,darkorange}$ Fire Damage to your attack or spell. This is decided before knowing if the attack or spell lands or not. Requires a Runic Weapon be equipped to use.

import.name: Rune: Flamestrike
import.description: A powerful rune enchanted to channel fire damage through a Runic Weapon. When casting a spell or attacking using the a Runic Weapon, you may consume one charge from this rune to add ${(int)d6,darkorange}$ Fire Damage to your attack or spell. This is decided before knowing if the attack or spell lands or not. Requires a Runic Weapon be equipped to use.

import.name: Rune: Petri
import.description:
A powerful rune enchanted to fire a petrification spell.

When attacking using the ${Boomstick,darkorange}$, you may consume this rune. On a hit, you deal ${(wis)d8,darkorange}$ [(wis)d8] Necrotic damage and force the creature to make a DC${15,darkorange}$ Constitution save. On a failure, the creature is permanently petrified until cured.

Requires a ${Boomstick,darkorange}$ to be equipped to use.

import.name: Rune: Petri
import.description:
A powerful rune enchanted to fire a petrification spell.

When attacking using the ${Boomstick,darkorange}$, you may consume this rune. On a hit, you deal ${(wis)d8,darkorange}$ [(wis)d8] Necrotic damage and force the creature to make a DC${15,darkorange}$ Constitution save. On a failure, the creature is permanently petrified until cured.

Requires a ${Boomstick,darkorange}$ to be equipped to use.

import.name: Rune: Petri
import.description:
A powerful rune enchanted to fire a petrification spell.

When attacking using the ${Boomstick,darkorange}$, you may consume this rune. On a hit, you deal ${(wis)d8,darkorange}$ [(wis)d8] Necrotic damage and force the creature to make a DC${15,darkorange}$ Constitution save. On a failure, the creature is permanently petrified until cured.

Requires a ${Boomstick,darkorange}$ to be equipped to use.

import.name: Rune: Petri
import.description:
A powerful rune enchanted to fire a petrification spell.

When attacking using the ${Boomstick,darkorange}$, you may consume this rune. On a hit, you deal ${(wis/3)d8,darkorange}$ Necrotic damage and force the creature to make a DC${15,darkorange}$ Constitution save. On a failure, the creature is permanently petrified until cured.

Requires a ${Boomstick,darkorange}$ to be equipped to use.

import.name: Rune: Focus
import.description: A powerful rune enchanted to fire a simple force spell. When casting a spell using a Runic Weapon, you may consume a charge from this rune. Your spell deals an additional ${(wis/2)d8,darkorange}$ Force damage on a failed save. Requires a Runic Weapon be equipped to use.

import.name: Alchemechical Reference Book
import.description: A large and thick book that makes brewing alchemy potions much easier.

import.name: Tkn Leaf
import.description: Heavy for a leaf and covered in a deep purple, it is known for the powerful arcane essence inside, it is used in the construct of runes and powerful magic enchantments.
import.note: Used in spell copying

import.name: Piyaqua's Locket
import.hiddenDescription: A normal looking locket with a picture of a young woman inside.

import.name: Aigua Leaf
import.description: A dark blue leaf known for its water properties, a useful ingredient in alchemy and enchanting recipes pertaining to such elemental alignments.

import.name: Lumen Leaf
import.description:
A bright white leaf that in the deep nights has a slight radiant glow to it. Known to be used in enchantments pertaining to light and the divine. 

Often also used in prayers because of its light properties.
import.note: Grows well in frigid temperatures and along streams.

import.name: Umusi Leaf
import.description: Deep black in color, this herb is great for producing thick black smoke. Sometimes added to brews for a deep smokey flavor or pipe blends for the stereotypical flavor.

import.name: Arcane Gisengard Scale
import.description: Recognizable by its larger size, this heavy scale is quite rare and valuable to those who know how to use it. The arcane properties of it make it very versatile and it is more easily enchanted than other materials, allowing for the creation of powerful tools. In the right hands of course.

import.name: Throwing Axe
import.description: A small axe, balanced for throwing but works for slashing.

import.name: Fire Throwing Axe
import.description: A small axe, great for slashing at people of throwing at a foe.

import.name: Icy Throwing Axe
import.description: A small axe, great for slashing at people of throwing at a foe.

import.name: Accurate Throwing Axe
import.description: A small axe, great for slashing at people of throwing at a foe.

import.name: Javelin
import.description:
A javelin, thrown for damage.

Thrown from inventory, does not need a free hand.

import.name: Small Golden Locket
import.description: Inside the locket are hand painted portraits of two young girls.
import.hiddenDescription: A small locket made for holding pictures. This was found in a small locked box under a witch's bed in the Isomere Bog.
import.note:
The portraits are of ${"content":"Tureana","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Piyaqua","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

Can bless someone with the memories of the lost daughters, granting +1 ${"content":"Wisdom","class":"rs-orange"}$ when worn correctly.

Repaired by ${"content":"Father Agonya","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ in ${"content":"Tebit","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

    "reaction": []

import.name: Mug of Hops
import.description:
After consuming beer from this mug, the mug gains a charge. The beer must be a ${Hop,orange}$ based beer. The only beers known to not be brewed this way are ${Elven,orange}$. Though, there may be others.

You may expend a charge a charge from the mug to reroll any ${Athletics,orange}$ checks.

If you perform an ${Athletics,orange}$ check related to ${Jumping,orange}$, you have advantage as long as this mug has at least 1 charge.

import.name: Mug of Mumbles
import.description:
After consuming any alcohol from this mug, you gain the effect ${"content":"Coherent Mumbling", "class": "rs-orange"}$ until your next long rest.

While you have that effect, you can speak clearly with animals as long as you are ${Drunk,orange}$ or ${Lush,orange}$.

import.name: Hardened Oakan Composite Bow
import.description: An extremely well crafted composite bow. Good for short and medium ranges and even effective at long ranges.

import.name: Oakan Bow Shield
import.description: A small arm guard made to work with bows. It helps the user defend themselves against some damage types.

import.name: Trackers Boots
import.description:
If you are stealthing, you leave no trace to be followed if you passed your DC with a 20 or higher.

When performing an ${"content":"Investigation", "class":"rs-orange"}$ or ${"content":"Perception", "class":"rs-orange"}$ check to track a creature, you have advantage.

import.name: Silvered Kunai
import.description:
A modified kunai with a special metallic  coating that allows it to pierce through some forms of physical damage resistance, particular known to be useful against Werewolves and Ghosts.

The coating is very expensive and hard to come by but due to their size, Kunai are relatively easy to coat.

And while the moderate increase in weight adds some heft for damage, the Kunai's range suffers a bit.

import.name: Byrjaren Bracers
import.description:
Dwarven bracers forged with inlaid golden runes. Allows the wearer to instantly recall a thrown weapon and the weapon will teleport back to their hand.

Must recall the weapon within 6 seconds and their is no distance limit on recalling the weapon.

If the weapon is surrendered instead of thrown, it can not be recalled.

If the weapon is unintentionally dropped or stolen, it can be recalled.

import.name: Byrjaren Bracers
import.description:
Dwarven bracers forged with inlaid golden runes. Allows the wearer to instantly recall a thrown weapon and the weapon will teleport back to their hand.

Must recall the weapon within 6 seconds and their is no distance limit on recalling the weapon.

If the weapon is surrendered instead of thrown, it can not be recalled.

If the weapon is unintentionally dropped or stolen, it can be recalled.

import.name: Byrjaren Bracers
import.description:
Dwarven bracers forged with inlaid golden runes. Allows the wearer to instantly recall a thrown weapon and the weapon will teleport back to their hand.

Must recall the weapon within 6 seconds and their is no distance limit on recalling the weapon.

If the weapon is surrendered instead of thrown, it can not be recalled.

If the weapon is unintentionally dropped or stolen, it can be recalled.

import.name: Byrjaren Bracers
import.description:
Dwarven bracers forged with inlaid golden runes. Allows the wearer to instantly recall a thrown weapon and the weapon will teleport back to their hand.

Must recall the weapon within 6 seconds and their is no distance limit on recalling the weapon.

If the weapon is surrendered instead of thrown, it can not be recalled.

If the weapon is unintentionally dropped or stolen, it can be recalled.

import.name: Byrjaren Bracers
import.description:
Dwarven bracers forged with inlaid golden runes. Allows the wearer to instantly recall a thrown weapon and the weapon will teleport back to their hand.

Must recall the weapon within 6 seconds and their is no distance limit on recalling the weapon.

If the weapon is surrendered instead of thrown, it can not be recalled.

If the weapon is unintentionally dropped or stolen, it can be recalled.

import.name: Strapped Quiver
import.description: Provides you with unlimited arrows for your bow.
import.note: Unlimited normal arrows or bolts.

import.name: Booted Quiver
import.description: Provides you with unlimited arrows for your bow.
import.note: Unlimited normal arrows or bolts.

import.name: Sending Stone
import.description:
This stone can communicate with other sending stones to which it is connected.

The degree and distance of communication depends on the strength of connection.
import.note:
${25,orange}$DC ${Arcana,orange}$ to "hang up". Can still call in or out though.

${30,orange}$DC ${Arcana,orange}$ to somewhat "trace".

import.name: Sending Stone
import.description:
Found in a Cthulian Temple on Claruthano, this stone was found in a ceremonial chamber.

This stone can communicate with other sending stones to which it is connected.

The degree and distance of communication depends on the strength of connection.
import.note:
${25,orange}$DC ${Arcana,orange}$ to "hang up". Can still call in or out though.

${30,orange}$DC ${Arcana,orange}$ to somewhat "trace".

Aligned with Channel A

import.name: Pendent of Cthulhu
import.description:
The bulk of the pendent bears the symbol of Cthulhu and is worn by his servants.

Has a redish glow to it that isn't quite pure red.
import.note:
Has tracking properties and allows communion with Cthulhu.

Is required to enter some rooms.

Is composed of a Red, Blue, and Orange power crystal.

Arcana DC20 to tell that it's 3 crystals.

Arcana DC30 to know the exact colors.

import.name: Ferio-Draco
import.description:
A heavy 2 handed spear made for piercing the thick hides of dragons. The price is that its weight makes it hard to wield.

When attacking Dragons or Dragonborn, this spear does an additional 8d6 piercing damage.

import.name: Lite Crafting Ingredients
import.description: Used in constructing and repairing things like swords and shields.

import.name: Heavy Crafting Ingredients
import.description: Used in constructing and repairing heavier items such as boats and buildings.

import.name: Twigs of Time
import.description: A rare herb known for is use in alchemical potions and enchantments effecting time.

import.name: Mutus Candle
import.description:
A blue 1 stud tall candle with blue wax that has a single golden rune inlaid at its base.

This candle is lit normally by fire.

Once lit, this candle burns for 3 hours, creating a sphere with a radius of 20 studs in which there is no sound.

While "lit", the wax of the candle slowly melts similar to a normal candle.

The candle can be moved after it's been lit but it can not be put out. Pinching it results in ${1d4,orange}$ or Fire damage.

Note: You will have to track the candle manually.
import.note: Reaches around corners to fill the radius if it can, otherwise cut off.

import.name: Autus Candle
import.description:
A green 1 stud tall candle with green wax that has a single golden rune inlaid at its base.

This candle is lit normally by fire.

Once lit, this candle burns for 3 hours, its smoke filling a 20 studs radius with its smoke.

Any creature that receives healing while breathing the smoke receives the max healing.

import.name: Robes of Cthulhu
import.description: Robes worn by servant of Cthulhu.

import.name: Lumen Bomb
import.description:
Takes 1 bonus action to use.

When thrown, the flask erupts in a blinding light. All creatures must pass a DC${10+dex,orange}$ Dexterity saving throw to cover their eyes if they are within 20 studs of where the flask lands.

Creatures that are aware of your actions, such as allies, have advantage on the save.

import.name: Fire Enchanting Stone
import.description: Fire enchanting stones are used for fire related enchantments on items and in some cases larger pieces such as boats or buildings.
import.note: Need 3 fire essences from elements, 3 red power crystals, and enchanters kit, 8 hours, and 36 enchanting herbs.

import.name: Nature Enchanting Stone
import.description: Nature enchanting stones are used for nature, poison, or acid related enchantments on items and in some cases larger pieces such as boats or buildings.
import.note: Need 3 earth essences from elements, 3 green power crystals, and enchanters kit, 8 hours, and 36 enchanting herbs.

import.name: Arcane Enchanting Stone
import.description: Arcane enchanting stones are used for enchantments that are related to controlling magics, and in more advanced enchantments this stone is required to essentially stabilize the ritual in general.
import.note: Need 3 water essences from elements, 3 blue power crystals, and enchanters kit, 8 hours, and 36 enchanting herbs.

import.name: Arcanous Stone
import.description: A special enchanting stone required for more powerful enchantments. Extremely hard to create and use.
import.note:
Need 3 earth essences, 3 fire essences, 3 water essences, the heart of a dragon, 3 orange power crystals, and enchanters kit, 5 days, and 72 enchanting herbs.

Over the 5 days, concentration checks are performed to continue the ritual through the sleeplessness.

import.name: Note on Arcane Crystal Research
import.description:
The colors of the arcane are diverse but not all crystals are needed; ${"content":"Red", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Blue", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and ${"content":"Green", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ seem to serve as the most basic of components and our research has shown that we can create the ${"content":"Lime", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Orange", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ crystals from them but ${"content":"Silver", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ still eludes us.

We have some information on how to create a ${"content":"Gold", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ crystal but have yet to test the proposed theory.

import.name: Tabbelt
import.description:
Once worn and attuned the belt fades and the attunee grows a cat's tail, granting advantage on acrobatics checks.

As long as the tail is visible, the attunee is also friendly with all small wild cats. Larger wild cats will remain cautious but are more likely to attempt to communicate.

Charges may be spent to reroll any dexterity saving throw.
import.hiddenDescription: Appears to be made out of the tail of a large cat
import.note:
Wisdom saving throws to avoid meowing in the middle of conversations.

Wisdom save is based on remaining charges.

Previous Action Map:
{
    "action": [],
    "bonusAction": [],
    "reaction": []
}

import.name: Simple Deck for Fish's Bet
import.description:
A simple desk for playing Fish's Bet. The basic rules are written on the case.

Each Player has 5 cards
Can ask questions:
+ How many (Paris/Triplets/Quadruplets) do you have?
+/- 1
+ What is the total of your hand?
+/- 5
+ How many (Hearts/Diamonds/Spades/Clubs) do you have?
+/- 1
+ How many (Black/Red) cards do you have?
+/- 2

The +/- range is how much youre allowed to lie.

import.name: Unrefined Chunk of Red Crystalline Ore
Flask of Black Cthulhian Liquid
import.description:
Contains a black liquid that you found in a temple of Cthulhu.

Burns as a ${"content":"Black Flame","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

import.name: Heavy War Mace
import.description: A heavy 2 handed war mace.

import.name: Sending Stone
import.description:
This stone can communicate with other sending stones to which it is connected.

The degree and distance of communication depends on the strength of connection.
import.note:
${25,orange}$DC ${Arcana,orange}$ to "hang up". Can still call in or out though.

${30,orange}$DC ${Arcana,orange}$ to somewhat "trace".

import.name: Mutus Candle (2 hours)
import.description:
A blue 1 stud tall candle with blue wax that has a single golden rune inlaid at its base.

This candle is lit normally by fire.

Once lit, this candle burns for 3 hours, creating a sphere with a radius of 20 studs in which there is no sound.

While "lit", the wax of the candle slowly melts similar to a normal candle.

The candle can be moved after it's been lit but it can not be put out. Pinching it results in ${1d4,orange}$ or Fire damage.

Note: You will have to track the candle manually.

import.name: Sheath Shield
import.description:
This shield holds 2 daggers, and as long as it has a dagger, you can stab with the dagger.

Additionally, you can throw a dagger from the shield as a reaction to being stuck.

import.name: Reserva
import.description:
A large tower shield that increases the armor of allies within 5 studs of you by 1.

In combat, you can strain yourself to expend a charge as a reaction to increase that to 5 until your turns comes up.

import.name: Esperit
import.description:
When striking a creature, a charge can be expended to summon a ghostly apparition of that creature that will aid you in battle.

The stats of the apparition are varied and depend slightly on the creature struck, only works on creatures with a threat rating of 5 (CR4) or lower. Can additionally be negated by legendary resistances.

import.name: Frelsi
import.description:
Enchanted with a spell to free the wearer under water.

On going into the water, make a wisdom save. If you are scared, you have disadvantage on this roll. If you are in combat, add ${10,orange}$ to the DCs below:
+ DC${3,orange}$| ${13,orange}$ - You can swim at normal speed
+ DC${7,orange}$| ${17,orange}$ - You can breathe normally under water for ${30,orange}$ minutes
+ DC${10,orange}$| ${20,orange}$ - Your vision is unhindered by the darkness of the water
import.hiddenDescription: A metal helm that is cold to the touch.

import.name: Veneficium
import.description:
You have advantage on ${"content":"Sleight of Hand","class":"rs-orange"}$ checks and any ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-orange"}$ check involving the casting of a spell.

You may also use a charge to reroll any check matching the mentioned conditions.
import.hiddenDescription: Purple gloves with the fingers free for dexterous movement.

import.name: Bellescut
import.description:
A small round shield with green crystalline runes inlaid around the edge.

You may expend a charge to give +${5,orange}$ to an a physical or magical attack or spell the DC of a spell cast by ${5,orange}$.
import.hiddenDescription: A small round shield with green crystalline runes inlaid around the edge.

import.name: Arcana Tuned Mandolin
import.description:
A ${"content":"Mandolin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ with a golden rune inscribed in the back. Sounds wonderful even when trying to make it play out of tune.

You may use a charge as a reaction to sing a short folk tale to motivate a creature from falling unconscious with a ${"content":"Performance","class":"rs-orange"}$ roll with DC${13,orange}$. Alternatively, before a short or long rest, choose a genre below and roll a ${1d4,orange}$.

+ Power Ballad
	1. Advantage (initiative | attack) ${1,orange}$ hour
	2. (${1d4,orange}$ | ${1d8,orange}$) Cold Damage for (${1,orange}$ | ${4,orange}$) hours
	3. (${1d4,orange}$ | ${1d8,orange}$) Fire Damage for (${1,orange}$ | ${4,orange}$) hours
	3. (${1d4,orange}$ | ${1d8,orange}$) Acid Damage for (${1,orange}$ | ${4,orange}$) hours
+ Folk Song
	1. (${1d6,orange}$ | ${2d12,orange}$) temporary health
	2. ${1d4,orange}$ inspiration  |  +${10,orange}$ Survival for ${4,orange}$ hours
	3. ${1d4,orange}$ inspiration  |  +${10,orange}$ Atheletics for ${4,orange}$ hours
	4. ${1d4,orange}$ inspiration  |  +${10,orange}$ Performance for ${4,orange}$ hours
+ Jazzy
	1. Advantage (concentration | perssuasion) for ${1,orange}$ hour
	2. +(${1,orange}$ | ${5,orange}$) Stealth for ${1,orange}$ hour
	3. Immunity (${Grappled,orange}$ | ${Charmed,orange}$) for ${1,orange}$ hour
	4. Advantage (${Wisdom,orange}$ | ${All,orange}$) Saves for ${1,orange}$ hour
+ Lullaby - Sleep Can't be interrupted
	1. ${1d6,orange}$ heal  |  Sleep takes ${6,orange}$ hours
	2. ${1d6,orange}$ heal  |  Everyone has good dreams
	3. (${1d6,orange}$ | ${2d12,orange}$) temporary health
	4. ${1d6,orange}$ heal  |  Everyone has bad dreams

Can regain 1 charge when a Pun is told with a ${"content":"Performance","class":"rs-orange"}$ roll of DC${15,orange}$.
import.hiddenDescription: A wooden mandolin with a golden rune inlaid in its back. Sounds beautiful when strummed.

import.name: Vindicta
import.description:
A red crystalline ring that reflects ${10%,orange}$ of any physical damage taken back to the creature that struck you.

If a weapon is not used to strike you, the creature attacking you will not suspect the magic of this ring.

If a weapon is used, the creature attacking you will receive similar cuts or bruises to where you were struck.
import.hiddenDescription: A ring seemingly made of red crystal

import.name: Inertia
import.description:
Once swung, you must move or have moved your full movement in combat or you will fall to the ground paralyzed for ${30,orange}$ minutes.

May expend any number of charges to deal an additional ${1d12,orange}$ damage as ${Thunder,orange}$ damage on a successful attack.

After combat ends, you collapse completely exhausted and can not move or perform any actions until you've completed a short rest.
import.hiddenDescription: An elegant heavy war axe.

import.name: Cervell
import.description:
A small blue crystal is attached to the chain with a small rune connecting it.

As long as there is a charge in the amulet, you are aware of any attempts to influence your mind and additionally know the spell ${"content":"Shield","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

At any time as a reaction, you may expend ${1,orange}$ charge to resist any mind altering effect or to cast the ${"content":"Shield","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ spell.
import.hiddenDescription: A necklace with a small blue crystal on its chain, with a small rune inscribed on the pendants casing.

import.name: Vial of Black Tar
import.description:
A vial of some kind of Black Tar that is related to Cthulhu.

Burns as a ${"content":"Black Flame","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.
import.note:
${"content":"Corrupted Blood of the Innocent","class":"rs-orange"}$

Created by sacrificing an innocent at an Alter of Cthulhu or by depositing their blood into a bowl for an offering.

import.name: Shorarg
import.description:
An Elven script book that can be consulted for additional help, though seems to be a bit sarcastic at times.

Can expend charges to different effects:
+ ${1,orange}$ charge for advantage on an ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-orange"}$ check involving a spell.
+ ${3,orange}$ charges to force disadvantage on saves against the spell you are casting
+ ${4,orange}$ charges to give allies advantage on saves against your spells.
+ ${8,orange}$ charges to double the range of a spell
+ ${15,orange}$ charges to be able to copy the spell cast on your action. Only works on spells of level ${pro-2,orange}$ or lower (Improves with your ${"content":"Proficiency","class":"rs-darkorange"}$).
import.note: Will occasionally wake you from sleep, breaking your long rest.

import.name: Unrefined Chunk of Blue Crystalline Ore
Unrefined Chunk of Green Crystalline Ore
Unrefined Chunk of Orange Crystalline Ore
Giant Spider Leg Tip

import.name: Giant Spider Fang

import.name: Fire Elemental Core
import.description:
The core of a fire elemental.

Radiates heat but doesn't seem to have much of any other effect.
import.note:
Loyalty: 100

Once attuned, every long rest roll a percentile and a d10. On rolling above the current loyalty, you can summon it that day.

If you roll a percentile below it's loyalty, it hisses at you and you can not summon it that day, but you gains the d20 in loyalty toward you.

Once it is fully loyal, the eyes stop glowing and sit as a translucent green.

When summoned while not fully loyal, a d10 is rolled and it can stay out for up to it's loyalty divided by 10 hours or the roll of the d10, whichever is lowest.

import.name: Fire Bomb
import.description:
Explodes dealing damage to all creatures in ${5,orange}$ stud radius.

When using, roll a D20 and add ${dex + wis,orange}$ to the roll. Any creature in the area with an armor rating above your roll takes half damage.

Creatures that fail the save against this item's DC catch fire and gain the effect ${"content": "Burning", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and suffer 1d6 ${"content": "Fire","class":"rs-orange"}$ damage per turn.

import.name: Cthulian Liquid infused Fire Bomb
import.description:
Explodes dealing damage to all creatures in ${5,orange}$ stud radius.

When using, roll a D20 and add ${dex + wis,orange}$ to the roll. Any creature in the area with an armor rating above your roll takes half damage.

Creatures that fail the save against this item's DC catch fire and gain the effect ${"content": "Rotting", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and suffer 1d12 ${"content": "Necrotic","class":"rs-orange"}$ damage per turn.

import.name: Potion of Divination
import.description:
When consumed your next long rest will have a dream regarding the soon to come future.

Succeeding the Wisdom save merely lets the dream come naturally. The degree of success may impact the dream to come.

import.name: Resistant Studded Leather Armor
import.description: A well constructed piece of leather serving as bodily protection that offers some protection against poison damage.

import.name: Via Plate
import.description: A solid plate of metal offers large protection from attacks created by Via.

import.name: Resistant Studded Leather Armor
import.description: A well constructed piece of leather serving as bodily protection that offers some protection against poison damage.

import.name: Via Plate of Slashing
import.description: A solid plate of metal offers large protection from attacks created by Via.

import.name: Belt of Carrying
import.description: A simple belt sturdy enough to offer limited protection.

import.name: Via's Metal Helm of Dark Vision
Studded Leather Armor of Resistance
import.description: A well constructed piece of leather serving as bodily protection.

import.name: Frost Dagger of Returning
import.description:
A dagger with a frost fog around it.

When thrown for an attack, will return back to your hand if it can. Force fields, different dimensions, and other factors may prevent the return.

import.name: Returning Silvered Kunai
import.description:
A modified kunai with a special metallic  coating that allows it to pierce through some forms of physical damage resistance, particular known to be useful against Werewolves and Ghosts.

The coating is very expensive and hard to come by but due to their size, Kunai are relatively easy to coat.

And while the moderate increase in weight adds some heft for damage, the Kunai's range suffers a bit.

When thrown for an attack, will return back to your hand if it can. Force fields, different dimensions, and other factors may prevent the return.

import.name: Okubi
import.description: A heavy tomb bearing the title ${"content":"Okubi","class":"rs-orange"}$, it seems to contain rituals and arcane sigils regarding the dead, however is proving hard to read.
import.note:
Written in ${"content":"Abyssal","class":"rs-orange"}$, reading it over time grants the feat ${"content":"Devil's Step","class":"rs-orange"}$, allowing you to walk silently but your eyes glow a deep red and your alignment may temporarily shift.

While sleeping with this book or near it, causes nightmares.

import.name: Ingosibuko
import.description: Several sigils seemed sparsely in long stretches of text that appear difficult to read...
import.note:
Written in ${"content":"Sylvan","class":"rs-orange"}$, it speaks of a large room with three mirrors and using ${"content":"Power Crystals","class":"rs-orange"}$ to reveal the shadows and find the placement to open the portal.

A small poem at the end of the book seems to translate as such:
```
Let go the strings  
The reigns of fate  
Follow the tracks  
And knock one back  
Seek with your mind  
And mind your eye  
The dark will hold  
The light will bind  
The shadow is kept...  
Nigh Divine  
```

import.name: Hoi Do Te
import.description: The pages are mostly covered in arcane runes and sigils but the text describing the pieces between makes no sense.
import.note:
Written in ${"content":"Aquan","class":"rs-orange"}$, the book seems to describe how to "Kill Time" allowing the one casting the spell to stop time in a small area.

However, the described spell and ritual to learn it appear insanely difficult. The author seems to be from the ${"content":"Sumaku","class":"rs-orange"}$ Sea.

import.name: Research Journal: Reading Ancient
import.description:
A research journal that seems describes someone's research into how to read ${"content":"Ancient","class":"rs-orange"}$. While there are many notes of things tried and failed, the final useful entry reads as such...

# 15 Unkulevum 316
Discovering that the ${"content":"Ancient","class":"rs-orange"}$ language is a cipher instead of a language has proven useful to finding things that do not work but progress has been made.

Empowering a ${"content":"Comprehend Language","class":"rs-orange"}$ ritual by modifying the arcane sigils and adding empowering runes seems to have helped, some pieces of the text have become vaguely readable to me.

It would seem that not only is it a cipher, but it is composed of multiple languages and I believe the total count to be 4. However finding the combination of languages is proving difficult as the empowered ritual circle takes several hours to complete and another day to use.

See me if you wish to attempt the ritual, the circles and runes are in my personal bindings.

import.name: Scroll of Wraithly Binding
import.description:
Summon a ${"content":"Wraith","class":"rs-orange"}$ construct and bind it to your service. Depending on your difficulty check, it will either not be summoned, will summon and follow your orders, or summon and immediately turn against you.

If you have one, you can perform an ${"content":"Enchanter's Kit Check","class":"rs-orange"}$ instead of a ${"content":"Wisdom Save","class":"rs-orange"}$ when using this item.

Once used, this scroll is entirely consumed, disintegrating in your hands.

This is not directly a spell.

import.name: Reefer Blend
import.description:
Commonly referred to as the "Reefer" blend, this mix of smokable herbs is blended to make the world a crazy place for a few minutes. Great for entertainment when passing some time alone.

Effect lasts for 10 to 30 minutes. Effects may vary. Consult your Shaman if you see hallucinations for longer than 4 hours.
import.note: A blend of alchemy ingredients with lumen and Aigua leaves. On a successful save everything looks like rainbows and unicorns and the creature can breathe underwater.

import.name: Pantsuit
import.description: A stylish pantsuit made from light, layered, fabrics.

import.name: Blouse
import.description: An elegant yet simple blouse.

import.name: Rune: Petri
import.description:
A powerful rune enchanted to fire a petrification spell.

When attacking using the ${Boomstick,darkorange}$, you may consume this rune. On a hit, you deal ${(wis)d8,darkorange}$ [(wis)d8] Necrotic damage and force the creature to make a DC${15,darkorange}$ Constitution save. On a failure, the creature is permanently petrified until cured.

Requires a ${Boomstick,darkorange}$ to be equipped to use.

import.name: Weaver's Wraps
import.description:
A pair of blue wraps meant to be worn around one's forearms, they grant better control over your movements.

Over time, you find your hands become more nimble, allowing you to perform various feats, but the nimbleness fades after doing so.

You may spend any number of charges to perform any of the below:
+ ${1,orange}$ Charge: Pick an item up from the ground as a ${"content":"Bonus Action", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${2,orange}$ Charges: Throw a weapon that is not normally throwable to a range of your strength modifier times 10 studs (${str * 10,orange}$).
+ ${3,orange}$ Charges: Gain advantage on a ${"content":"Slight of Hand", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ check
+ ${4,orange}$ Charges: Gain advantage on an ${"content":"Acrobatics", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ check
+ ${5,orange}$ Charges: Double the outer throwing distance (Where at disadvantage) of a thrown weapon
+ ${7,orange}$ Charges: Double the inner throwing distance of a thrown weapon
+ ${10,orange}$ Charges: Disengage from a creature for free
+ ${15,orange}$ Charges: Take a second attack with your main hand, only when you've just attacked with your main hand. This can be used multiple times.
+ ${20,orange}$ Charges: When attacking, roll a second D20 and add it to your attack roll.
+ ${30,orange}$ Charges: When attacking with your main hand, double the damage dealt. If you landed a critical hit, this doubles the result of the critical damage.
import.note: Story:ToGive

import.name: The Great Latro's Boots
import.description: Belong to the great thief ${"content":"Latro", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$, these boots grant an array of possible powers to invoke. Needing to to charge, they slowly gain in quickness, though the feeling fades after using them. Max number of charges is proportional to your Dexterity Modifier (${dex,orange}$). You may spend any number of charges to perform any of the below: + ${1,orange}$ Charge: Move an additional stud + ${2,orange}$ Charges: Pass an ${"content":"Athletics", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ DC${10,orange}$ check to jump 3 stories. This does not yield a combat bonus and use during combat is disadvantageous + ${3,orange}$ Charges: Advantage on an ${"content":"Athletics", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ check that involves your feet (Such as running. Something like Arm Wrestling would not count) + ${4,orange}$ Charges: Advantage on a ${"content":"Stealth", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ check + ${5,orange}$ Charges: Hide during combat for free + ${10,orange}$ Charges: Disengage from a creature for free + ${15, orange}$ Charges: Take another Movement Action in combat for 1 turn (Can be used multiple times) + ${20, orange}$ Charges: Take another Bonus Action in combat for 1 turn (Can be used multiple times) + ${30, orange}$ Charges: In combat, until your next turn, you can perform a controlled double jump, allowing you to strike from the peak of the jump for additional melee damage. Attacks with ranged weaponry are harder to hit but gain additional damage if performed during the jump. Melee adds ${"content":"([Strength Modifier]/2)","class":"rs-orange"}$d${"content":"8","class":"rs-orange"}$ (${(str/2),orange}$d${8,orange}$). Ranged adds ${"content":"([Dexterity Modifier]/3)","class":"rs-orange"}$d${"content":"8","class":"rs-orange"}$ (${(dex/3),orange}$d${8,orange}$).
import.note: Story:ToGive

import.name: War Pants
import.description: A light set of pants that allows the creature wearing them to maintain their agility, even under the pressure of battle.

import.name: Barbarian War Pants
import.description:
The light weight cloth seems oddly particularly to the type of creature to wear it.

When worn by a ${"content":"Barbarian", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$, they can feel their jimmies rustled and sense the call of battle.

While wearing these pants, whenever combat starts, you may use a charge to enter a ${"content":"Rage", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ at the start of battle regardless of your position in the initiative order.

Going into a ${"content":"Rage", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ still consumes one of the feat's charges.

import.name: Pommel of Mist
import.description: The pommel of the Blade of the Mist. It is simple in design but is clearly composed of a golden power crystal.
import.note:
Has a gentle cry to any who rests with it, calling out for the other pieces of itself.

See the Mists Edge notes.

Currently in a temple underwater in the sea of Onach.

import.name: Keg of Dionysus
import.description:
14/16 drinks left

Heals 2d4 when a change is consumed (Requires a mug or flask to drink)

When poured, only retains the healing effect for a moment.
import.note: Each drink is 3 weight

import.name: Sanctuary's Oath
import.description:
A large brown shield bearing long runic engravings.

When any creature within 4 studs of you is attacked, you may use your reaction to give that creature your AC rating until the end of the current creature's turn. If you do this, attacks against you are at advantage until the end of the current turn.

Spells or feats that temporarily boost your AC do not carry over to the target you are protecting.

By being attuned to this shield, you know the spell ${"content":"Sanctuary", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Additionally, you may use a charge to cast it instead of a spell slot.

import.name: Reservera
import.description:
A sturdy yet light blade. Once understood, appears nimble enough to aid in one's defense.

In combat, you may use a charge to add 2 + ${"content":"Your Dex Modifier", "class":"rs-orange"}$ (${2+dex,orange}$) to your AC for the rest of the round. You may use this after you know if an attack will hit you or not.

import.name: Athena's Blessing
import.description:
An ancient relic blessed by ${"content":"Athena", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ herself.

While attuned with this relic, you may cast spells of level ${1,orange}$ or lower as a reaction to a friendly creature being harmed. A spell slot is still used when cast this way.

If you are a follower of ${"content":"Athena", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$, you may cast spells up to level ${2,orange}$
import.hiddenDescription: A holy symbol but the details of it are unknown.

import.name: Shimmered Pantsuit
import.description:
A special made pantsuit the at a glance seems normal but when viewed closer has a slight shimmer to its surface.

Once in touch with the magics within the threads, a charge can be used to dazzle those around you, the shimmer of the suit coming to life in an elegant display of light and glitter.

If combat starts, the charge can be used to start a ${"content":"Surprise Round","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ against the attacking foes where all friendly creatures go first regardless of initiative order.

import.name: Dagger Bracers
import.description: You can keep 2 additional daggers readied outside of your other readied limitations.

import.name: Locke of Inrena Sollace's Hair
import.note: Improves ability to scry on her but she may also get advantage on noticing.

import.name: Ilerar's Scroll of Communication
import.description: [ Currently Blank ]
import.note: Used by Ilerar to communicate with ICP.

import.name: Night Die
import.description:
The Night Die is a fortune telling die that can predict safety during sleep.

When rolled and a charge is used, it foretells what will happen, though reading it may be a bit of a challenge s the language it foretells in can change.

A charge can not be used by someone to which the die is not attuned (Must be equipped to your pouch).

It is easy to know when the foretelling has failed from the extreme headache you will experience, and you can expect nightmares that night.

Can only use 1 charge per day.
import.hiddenDescription: Mysteriously black twelve sided die with no symbols or runes. Each side is merely a smooth black surface.
import.note:
The Night Die is the result of an experiment in divination with the power crystals.

The infusion with the power crystals resulted in the die speaking in ancient, but since the responses are one word, it cycles between Ancients base languages.

import.name: Padded Grappling Hook
import.description:
Grappling hook for scaling steep inclines.

Harder to catch with but quieter.

import.name: Test Item 22
import.description: This is a test Item

import.name: Aiming Charm (test)
import.description: A small charm to put around your waist.

import.name: Blue Power Crystal
import.description: A familiar palm sized crystal with a blueglow.
import.note:
${"content":"The Citizen","class":"rs-orange"}$

When holding this crystal in your hand, you may make a DC${19-wis,darkorange}$ check against your ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-orange"}$ or ${"content":"Enchanter's Kit","class":"rs-orange"}$ skill.

Affects Magical Schools:
+ Illusions: Larger
+ Evocation: Greater Area of Effect (No area of effect gains a small one)
+ Divination: Longer Range

import.name: Felling Axe
import.description:
A large unwieldy axe for cutting down and breaking up trees.

While hard to maneuver, it does triple damage to trees.

import.name: Kintarian Ritual Spear (DEPR)
import.description: A ritual spear for combat, only used by seasoned warriors of the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.
import.note:
Attuning to this fills your mind with evil thoughts of greed, lust, and chaos.

Wisdom save DC20 to resist each day.

import.description:

import.name: Athena's Curse
import.description: An ancient relic, cursed by an unknown force that once served to channel the ${"content":"Wisdom","class":"rs-orange"}$ of ${"content":"Athena","class":"rs-orange"}$.
import.note:
Purify with remove curse and a religion roll.

Becomes Athena's Blessing

import.name: Dionysian Blessing
import.description:
An ancient relic blessed by ${"content":"Dionysus", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ himself.

While attuned with this relic, you may use a charge to make a religion roll, testing your connection with ${"content":"Dionysus", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$. If you do not worship him, you do not add your ${"content":"Religion", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ modifier. This roll can not fail.

Once rolled, friendly creatures within 100 studs of you can not have disadvantage on saving throws, skill checks, or attacks for that many rounds 
( ${"content":"Rolled Value", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ x ${"content":"6 Seconds", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ Time ).

You do not control or choose the creatures. For example, if a hostile creature casts  ${"content":"Friends", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ on you, that creature is then included within the effects of the blessing.
import.hiddenDescription: A holy symbol but the details of it are unknown.

import.name: Eldith's Arcane Society Acolyte Membership
import.description:
Serves as your limited access to the arcane society library and notes about your research.

Your research being ${"content":"Great Wyrms","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and the ${"content":"Magical Beans","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ they excret.

Your task is to research the beans, acquire some for the society, and discover new beans.

import.name: Rune: Focus
import.description:
A powerful rune enchanted to fire a simple force spell.

When attacking using the ${Boomstick,darkorange}$, you may consume a charge from this rune. On a hit, you deal ${(wis/2)d8,darkorange}$ Force damage.

Requires a ${Boomstick,darkorange}$ to be equipped to use.

import.name: Ring of Visius
import.description:
An ancient ring instilled with arcane powers through means that have long since been forgotten, sharpening the wears vision and wits.

The shadows of the night become perceptible to you and your sight has clarity many times greater than you would normally.

In combat, the charges have many uses:
+ ${1,orange}$ ${"content":"Charge","class":"rs-darkorange"}$: Critical hit with a ${16,orange}$ or higher
+ ${2,orange}$ ${"content":"Charges","class":"rs-darkorange"}$: You may move ${Triple,orange}$ your ${Walk/Run,orange}$ distance for your movement.
+ ${3,orange}$ ${"content":"Charges","class":"rs-darkorange"}$: Add ${5,orange}$ to your ${Armor/AC,orange}$ rating as a reaction until your turn.

Out of combat, the sharpened wit continues to give the ring uses:
+ ${1,orange}$ ${"content":"Charge","class":"rs-darkorange"}$: Automatically succeed a ${Wisdom,orange}$ save
+ ${2,orange}$ ${"content":"Charges","class":"rs-darkorange"}$: You may reroll a ${Perception,orange}$ check
+ ${3,orange}$ ${"content":"Charges","class":"rs-darkorange"}$: Add ${5,orange}$ to an ${Insight,orange}$ check. Has a favored enemy

import.name: Cracked Red Power Crystal
import.description: A familiar palm sized crystal with a red glow.
import.note:
${"content":"The Curator","class":"rs-orange"}$

When holding this crystal in your hand, you may make a DC${15-wis,darkorange}$ check against your ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-orange"}$ or ${"content":"Enchanter's Kit","class":"rs-orange"}$ skill.

import.name: Cracked Orange Power Crystal
import.description: A familiar palm sized crystal with a orange glow.
import.note:
${"content":"The Composer","class":"rs-orange"}$

When holding this crystal in your hand, you may make a DC${21-wis,darkorange}$ check against your ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-orange"}$ or ${"content":"Enchanter's Kit","class":"rs-orange"}$ skill.

import.name: Flute
import.description: A simple flute for playing music and general entertainment. Makes ${"content":"Performance","class":"rs-orange"}$ checks involving music easier.
import.note:
Music:
+ Witcher 3: ${"content":"Drink Up, There's More","class":"rs-orange"}$

import.name: Loose Threads from Athenian Enclave
import.description: Found in a collapsed temple to ${Athena,orange}$, they were next to an empty pedestal where it's likely there was once an blessed charm.
import.note: TODO: Figure out who this belongs to

import.name: Zwa
import.description:
Ancient Elven bracers made for a great warrior who's spirit seems to reside inside.

At the start of any fight, you may make a ${Constitution,orange}$ DC${20-wis,orange}$ save. On success, you take no damage from using charges.

During any fight you may use any number of charges for the below effects:
+ ${1,orange}$ Charge: Add 1d12 ${Necrotic,orange}$ damage to your attack
+ ${2,orange}$ Charges: Critical on a roll of ${19,orange}$, however your roll total must still hit
+ ${4,orange}$ Charges: Ignore the target's armor and automatically critical

If you have not made a successful ${Constitution,orange}$ save, you take 1d8 ${Psychic,orange}$ damage for each charge used.

This applies only to weapon attacks and not to spells.
import.hiddenDescription: Fancy bracers with gold veins inlaid inside it.
import.note: Zwa is an ancient elven warrior known in Leoterra, but not much of anywhere else.

import.name: Cello
import.description: An impressive and delicate stringed instrument for playing music and general entertainment. Makes ${"content":"Performance","class":"rs-orange"}$ checks involving music easier.
import.note:
Music:
+ [TBD]

import.name: Drum
import.description: A simple but effective instrument for playing music and general entertainment. Makes ${"content":"Performance","class":"rs-orange"}$ checks involving music easier.
import.note:
Music:
+ [TBD]

import.name: Violin
import.description: An intricutely carved instrument for playing music and general entertainment. Makes ${"content":"Performance","class":"rs-orange"}$ checks involving music easier.
import.note:
Music:
+ Skyrim: ${"content":"Wind Guide You","class":"rs-orange"}$

import.name: Decorative Flute
import.description:
A simple flute for playing music and general entertainment. Makes ${"content":"Performance","class":"rs-orange"}$ checks involving music easier.

Along the bottom of the flute, a gold inscription lies inlaid in the flute.

You may use a charge to double the audible range of your playing.
import.note:
Music:
+ Witcher 3: ${"content":"Drink Up, There's More","class":"rs-orange"}$

import.name: Andiziyo
import.description:
Seemingly just the hilt of a blade. As you examine it, the hilt produces an energy like blade. A culmination of the souls of all the creatures its slain, the blade of this dagger is a long purple beam. The beam giving no resistance or weight, causing it to behave like a dagger instead of a swird.

At the beginning of combat, make a ${Constitution,orange}$ DC${20-level,orange}$ save. On failure, using this blade causes 1d8 ${Necrotic,orange}$ damage with every strike as the blade drains your life force to power itself. Alternatively, a ${"content":"Red","class":"rs-red"}$ or ${"content":"Blue","class":"rs-blue"}$ ${"content":"Power Crystal","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ may be attached to the blade to satisfy the needs of the blade.

If a crystal is attached, roll 1d12 at the end of any combat. On a ${12,orange}$, the crystal shatters.

When a creature is slain by you, its life force is absorbed by this blade. This hilt is treated as the corpse of the dead for the purposes of things like ${"content":"Speak with the Dead","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ or ${"content":"Gentle Repose","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

When striking, charges can be expended from the hilt to various effects:
+ ${1,orange}$ Charge: Add ${1,orange}$d12 ${Necrotic,orange}$ damage
+ ${2,orange}$ Charges: If you've managed to hit, the hit is a critical hit
+ ${3,orange}$ Charges: Add ${3*wis,orange}$d12 ${Necrotic,orange}$ damage

If this blade is used while not attuned, the creature using the blade takes ${4,orange}$d8 ${Necrotic,orange}$ damage for every attack.
import.hiddenDescription: A purple runic handle with runic symbols inlaid along the hilt.

import.name: Temperance
import.description: You know the three spells ${"content":"Shield","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Mental Barrier","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Thought Shield","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and can use charges from this ring to cast them instead of using a spell slot to do so and can cast them as a reaction on yourself or any creature within ${5*wis,orange}$ (5 x Wisdom Modifier) studs of you.
import.hiddenDescription: Ring with a blueish tint.

import.name: Remembrance
import.description:
Whenever you take damage, divide it by 3 and round down and add that to the ring's charges.

When striking a target, any number of charges may be released to add that much ${Fire,orange}$ damage to a weapon or spell attack. However the charges must be chosen for use before you know if the attack will hit.
import.hiddenDescription: A reddish tinted ring.

import.description: A thick but lightweight belt that helps oritect your waist.

import.description: Contains common formulas, runes, and arcane formations to help making enchanting easier.

import.description: When touched by non-Kintari, deals ${6,orange}$d10 ${Necrotic,orange}$ damage.

import.name: Identity
import.description:
Set of papers and documents to prove one's history, identity, and travels.

Created:   
Expires:

import.name: Traceless
import.description: When attuned, a charge can be used to erase your foot prints as you move.

import.name: Dust of Shadows
import.description: When attuned, a charge worth of dust can be pulled from the pouch to cover a large or smaller creature and make it invisible as long as it does not move.

import.name: Dust of Tracelessness
import.description: When attuned, a charge worth of dust be used to cover 64 studs worth of food prints.

import.name: Dust of Pixies
import.description:
When attuned, a charge worth of dust can be thrown into the air and cause any creatures in a radius equal to your ${Intelligence,orange}$ Modifier (${int,orange}$).

All creatures in the area make a ${Wisdom,orange}$ DC${10+wis,orange}$ save. Those who fail are effected by ${"content":"Pixie Tongue","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ causing them to random insult other creature's with whom they are interacting.

import.name: Obscurance Bomb
import.description:
Takes 1 bonus action to use.

When thrown on the ground, creates a small heavily obscured area of 10 stud radius

Creatures outside the smoke have disadvantage on attacks and perception checks that go into or pass through the cloud.

Creatures inside the cloud see and attack normally.

import.name: Amnesia Dust
import.description:
Dust slowly fills the pouch using the excess energy from the attuned creature.

When a creature is exposed to the dust, it must make a ${Wisdom,orange}$ DC${8 + wis,orange}$ save or forget the last ${minute,orange}$ from its memory.

However the dust is difficult to handle and you may expose yourself to the dust. When used, make a ${Sleight,orange}$ ${of,orange}$ ${Hand,orange}$ DC${10-dex,orange}$ Skill Check, and on failure you also forget the last minute.

Any creature effected by forgetfulness has its memory restored when exposed to a Level ${3,orange}$ or higher healing spell.

import.name: Enchanted Travelers Pack
import.description:
Acts as a modified bag of holding for carrying all of your things.

Allows you to carry your ${"content":"Strength Modifier","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ * 100 (${str * 100,orange}$) in additional weight.

Though while you feel like what you are carrying is easily moved, you still weight the full amount when traveling or being lifted.

import.name: Eva's'ar
import.description:
An ornate handle adorns the chilling black blade on this dagger. Seemingly ritualistic in nature, a ghostly shadow looms along the blade.

Any ${Necrotic,orange}$ damage dealt while attacking with this blade can not be healed.
import.hiddenDescription: An ornate handle adorns the chilling black blade on this dagger. Seemingly ritualistic in nature, a ghostly shadow looms along the blade.
import.note:
${"content":"Durong", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ being an evil god, use of this item lets him see you clearly and slowly corrupts the creature using it to evil.

If the creature is already evil, this has no effect.

import.name: Onslaught's Box
import.description: Wielded as a pair of matching swords, what you carry is a medium runic box. While attuned, you can summon the swords to your hands. They can not be stolen from your hands and you can not be disarmed. While wielding the swords, anyone who would successfully disarm or grapple you takes ${1d6,orange}$ of ${Cold,orange}$ damage, though you may still be grappled. When attacking with the swords, you use both your ${"content":"Action","class":"rs-orange"}$ and your ${"content":"Bonus Action","class":"rs-orange"}$ but make only one attack roll as the swords hit or miss in unison. You take reduced damage from Cold, but increased damage from Fire.

import.name: Revealing Sands
import.description:
Can use a charge to pull a handful of dust from the pouch. The dust can cast on ${wis*wis,orange}$ Studs to reveal invisible creatures or any creatures in the ${"content":"Ethereal Plane","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

To be revealed, the dust must cover ${50%,orange}$ or more of the creature.

If the creature is in another plane, it still follows the usual rules of interaction.

import.name: Gate Dust
import.description:
Powerful runes adorn this pouch containing dust. The dust inside allows creatures to shift between planes.

Using ${1,orange}$ Charge can shift a single creature to the ${"content":"Ethereal Plane","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

Using ${12/wis,orange}$ Charge(s) can shift a single creature to any Plane adjacent to the ${"content":"Ethereal Plane","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

import.name: Heavy Plate Belt
import.description:
A heavy layered plate belt to protect one's mid-section.

While it offers a solid layer of protection, its weight is impeding.

import.name: Heavy Plated Boots
import.description: Heavy plated boots make you harder to hit but slow your movement.

import.name: Arcanic Channeling Staff
import.description:
A powerful staff with a ${"content":"Red Power Crystal","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ encased in the head of the staff.

Silver veins stream forth from the gem, flowing down the staff through several runes, channeling the power into the attuned.

The power of the crystal improves the wielders ${"content":"Spell Attack","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Spell DC","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

Additionally, a charge may be expended to grant an additional ${"content":"Reaction","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.
import.hiddenDescription: Long staff that seems to have a red power crystal in its head.

import.name: Contouring Power Staff
import.description:
A powerful staff with a ${"content":"Blue Power Crystal","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ encased in the head of the staff.

Silver veins stream forth from the gem, flowing down the staff through several runes, channeling the power into the attuned.

The power of the crystal

import.name: Cape of Invisibility
import.description: While heavier than it looks, this cape allows the attuned to become invisible for a period of time equal to your ${Wisdom,orange}$ Modifier (${wis,orange}$) in hours when a charge is used. This invisibility is ended when you take any Action. Use of multiple charges does not stack, the invisibility merely ends the duration of time from the last used charge. If the cape is and removed while the invisibility is active, the invisibility ends, and the cape can be removed by force while you are invisible. The invisibility does not extend to any other creature, regardless of that creature's position to you.

import.name: Serinal's Blessing
import.description:
An ancient relic blessed by ${"content":"Serinal", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ herself.

The number of charges available is equal to your ${"content":"Wisdom","class":"rs-orange"}$ (${wis,orange}$) Modifier + your ${"content":"Intelligence","class":"rs-orange"}$ (${int,orange}$) Modifier.

While attuned with this relic, you may use a charge to succeed a ${Wisdom,orange}$ or ${Intelligence,orange}$ save instead of rolling. Once rolled, you can not use a charge.

Additionally you can use ${2,orange}$ charges to recover a Level ${1,orange}$ spell slot.

If you are a follower of ${"content":"Serinal", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$, you may additionally use ${4,orange}$ charges to recover a Level ${2,orange}$ spell slot.

import.name: Wandering Dust
import.description:
Allows the attuned creature to pull forth a handful of dust that can be cast across a floor, wall, or ceiling to create a portal.

To complete a portal, one handful of dust must be laid out somewhere and a small arcane chant said over it where a ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-orange"}$ Check is made. Then, in another location no more than ${20,orange}$ times your ${"content":"Wisdom","class":"rs-orange"}$ Modifier studs away (${20*wis,orange}$), another handful of dust can be scattered and another ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-orange"}$ Check made.

On success, a Portal is created that connects the 2 locations and allows at least ${int,orange}$ number of creatures through before collapsing, but may allow more.

The stability and success of the portal depend on a number of factors determined by where the portal is created and the difficulty involved will vary according. However, on a completely open unoccupied field, the portal can not fail to create.

<sub>There have been cases reported of people traveling through the portal finding themselves briefly in another realm and coming out with moderate ${"content":"Fire","class":"rs-orange"}$ or ${"content":"Poison","class":"rs-orange"}$ damage that seems to related to issues with portal stability.</sub>

import.description: A heavy banner of a crimson color. Glows when prayed to and seems to have an odd, and varied, effect on some near-by creatures.
import.note:
Used by kintari to send them into a frenzy:
+ Warriors get an extra attack
+ Elders become undying once dead, dealing large necrotic damage in fights but have no effect while alive

import.name: Durong's Blessing
import.description:
An ancient relic blessed by ${"content":"Durong", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ himself.

While attuned with this relic, you may use a charge to empower a cast spell, ${Doubling,orange}$ the damage it deals.

If the spell heals, or does not do damage, a charge has no effect.

The number of charges is equal to your ${Intelligence,orange}$ Modifier and your ${Charisma,orange}$ Modifier influences how long it takes to recharge.

If you are a follower of ${"content":"Durong", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the damage from the spell is ${Quadrupled,orange}$ instead.

When a charge is used from this blessing, blood slowly gushes forth from your eyes and your skin pales. Your vision remains mostly clear through the effect, merely making ${Perception,orange}$ checks more difficult, but your aspect becomes almost frightening. The duration of the aspect effect depends on the number of charges used, but usually lasts for an hour.

import.description:
Allows the attuned creature to pull forth a handful of dust that can be cast across a floor, wall, or ceiling to create a portal.

To complete a portal, one handful of dust must be laid out somewhere and a small arcane chant said over it where a ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-orange"}$ Check is made. Then, in another location no more than ${20,orange}$ times your ${"content":"Wisdom","class":"rs-orange"}$ Modifier studs away (${20*wis,orange}$), another handful of dust can be scattered and another ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-orange"}$ Check made.

On success, a Portal is created that connects the 2 locations and allows at least ${int,orange}$ number of creatures through before collapsing, but may allow more.

The stability and success of the portal depend on a number of factors determined by where the portal is created and the difficulty involved will vary according. However, on a completely open unoccupied field, the portal can not fail to create.

<sub>There have been cases reported of people traveling through the portal finding themselves briefly in another realm and coming out with moderate ${"content":"Fire","class":"rs-orange"}$ or ${"content":"Poison","class":"rs-orange"}$ damage that seems to related to issues with portal stability.</sub>

import.name: Guard of the Mist
import.description: The guard of the Blade of the Mist. It is simple in design but each end of the piece seems to contain a Silver Power Crystal. However its power seems constrained and inaccessible.
import.note:
Has a gentle cry to any who rests with it, calling out for the other pieces of itself.

See the Mists Edge notes.

Currently in southern Lurus protected by a manifestation of the blade that resulted from a near by Cthulhian temple and the guard being outside of any kind of containment, unlike the previous 2 who were peaceful retrieved in a manner that did not trigger the release of energy

import.name: Guarvello's Blade
import.description: If an attack is successfully Parried, a charge may be used to reflect the damage.

import.name: Guarvello's Vestment
import.description:
When taking damage from spells, the damage that soaks through your reductions can be funneled into charges on this vest instead.

Once the vest reaches maximum charges, the damage is expelled as ${"content":"Psychic","class":"rs-orange"}$ Damage to you and all creatures within ${7,orange}$ studs of you.

import.name: Guarvello's Bracers
import.description: A charge may be expended to attune with a ${"content":"Crystalline Power Sphere","class":"rs-orange"}$, gaining its bonuses.

import.name: Guarvello's Boots
import.description: May expend a charge to succeed a strength or dexterity save.

import.name: Guardian Spear
import.description:
An ancient extra-planar spear that is difficult to wield.

If you do not have proficiency with ${"content":"Mythril Armor","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, using this weapon deals ${1d12,orange}$ ${"content":"Physic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ damage.

Returns to the nearest Guardian after 2 rounds unless it is on the Guardians plane of origin, in which case it returns immediately.
import.note: TODO: Determine Guardian Plane

import.name: Guarvello's Sling
import.description: May expend a charge when attacking with a spear from this sling to throw 2 spears with that attack.

import.name: Cape of Invisibility
import.description: While heavier than it looks, this cape allows the attuned to become invisible for a period of time equal to your ${Wisdom,orange}$ Modifier (${wis,orange}$) in hours when a charge is used. This invisibility is ended when you take any Action. Use of multiple charges does not stack, the invisibility merely ends the duration of time from the last used charge. If the cape is and removed while the invisibility is active, the invisibility ends, and the cape can be removed by force while you are invisible. The invisibility does not extend to any other creature, regardless of that creature's position to you.
